ai_choice.title: Apply to make change to a council flat - Sefton - Choice

Best match.Title: Private Sector Housing Assistance Policy | Sefton Council
Best match.Reason: The policy states that privately rented property requests will require written landlord permission prior to works being carried out, which aligns with David's need to request permission for flat improvements.

ai_page.body:
It looks like the content you provided is not an HTML web page source, but rather the raw content of a **PDF file**. This is evident from the `%PDF-1.7` header and the binary/non-HTML content throughout your sample.

**To extract the main body content in semantic HTML, I need the actual HTML source code of a web page.** Please provide the HTML you would like me to process, not a PDF or binary file.

If you have the PDF and wish to extract the "editorial" content as HTML, you would first need to convert the PDF to (plain) HTML or text, which is a different process. If you want help with that workflow, let me know! Otherwise, please paste the HTML source of the web page you want cleaned and I'll extract the main content per your instructions.
